bibl.title: La datazione dei Sicioni di Menandro e il contesto storico-politico.
bibl.note: The title and some details of Menander's Sikyonians could refer to events which occurred in 314 B.C. or soon after. The quarrel between the democrat and the oligarch (vv. 150-168) could reveal that Menander's political thought was close to the regime of Demetrius of Phaleron. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Maria Vittoria Tozzi, La datazione dei Sicioni di Menandro e il contesto storico-politico.

The title and some details of Menander's Sikyonians could refer to events which occurred in 314 B.C. or soon after. The quarrel between the democrat and the oligarch (vv. 150-168) could reveal that Menander's political thought was close to the regime of Demetrius of Phaleron. - Avec résumé en anglais.
